title: Monolithic Architecture
description: Understand traditional monolithic architecture, where all components are tightly coupled in a single codebase. Learn pros, cons, and when to use.

title: Microservices Architecture
description: Learn microservices design, service decomposition, inter-service communication, and distributed system challenges.

title: Layered Architecture
description: Understand layered (N-tier) architecture with presentation, business, persistence, and database layers.

title: API Gateway Pattern
description: Learn API gateway pattern for request routing, authentication, rate limiting, and backend service abstraction.

title: CQRS: Command Query Responsibility Segregation
description: Understand CQRS pattern for separating read and write models, improving scalability and performance.

title: Event Sourcing: Storing Events as Source of Truth
description: Learn event sourcing pattern where state changes are stored as immutable events, enabling auditability and time travel.

title: Circuit Breaker Pattern: Fault Tolerance
description: Understand circuit breaker pattern for handling failures, preventing cascading failures in distributed systems.

title: Bulkhead Pattern: Isolation
description: Learn bulkhead pattern for isolating resources to prevent cascading failures and ensure system resilience.

title: Saga Pattern: Distributed Transactions
description: Understand saga pattern for managing distributed transactions across multiple services using choreography or orchestration.

title: Load Balancing Strategies
description: Learn load balancing algorithms, horizontal and vertical scaling, and distribution strategies.

title: Caching Strategies: Redis, Memcached
description: Master caching patterns including cache-aside, write-through, write-behind, and cache invalidation strategies.

title: Database Sharding and Partitioning
description: Learn horizontal sharding strategies, partition keys, and handling cross-partition queries.

title: Database Replication and Consistency
description: Understand master-slave replication, consistency models (strong, eventual), and CAP theorem.

title: Message Queues: Asynchronous Communication
description: Learn message queue systems like Kafka, RabbitMQ, and pub/sub patterns for decoupled communication.

title: Rate Limiting and Throttling
description: Implement rate limiting algorithms like token bucket, sliding window, and leaky bucket.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Understand OAuth, JWT, SAML, role-based access control, and attribute-based access control.

title: Logging, Monitoring, and Observability
description: Implement structured logging, centralized logging, metrics collection, tracing, and dashboards.

title: Containerization: Docker and Kubernetes
description: Learn Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for container orchestration at scale.

title: CI/CD: Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Understand CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, deployment strategies, and monitoring.

title: Disaster Recovery and High Availability
description: Learn RTO/RPO, backup strategies, failover mechanisms, and business continuity planning.
